title: Hackers Repurpose RansomHub's EDRKillShifter in Medusa, BianLian, and Play Attacks
description: A new analysis has uncovered connections between affiliates of RansomHub and other ransomware groups like Medusa, BianLian, and Play. The connection stems from the use of a custom tool that's designed to disable endpoint detection and response (EDR) software on compromised hosts, according to ESET.
